casebody.data:
Vance D. DAY, Judge, Circuit Court of Oregon, Third Judicial District, petitioner,
v.
OREGON COMMISSION ON JUDICIAL FITNESS AND DISABILITY. No. 18-112. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 9, 2018.

Motion of Freedom of Conscience Defense Fund for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Oregon denied.
